alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 8:23PM CDT until April 09 at 11:12AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Goliad and Karnes Counties. .Rain has ended in the basin and the river is near crest now. It is forecast to begin to slowly recede tonight and fall below flood stage on Sunday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 33.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Friday was 33.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue falling to 11.2 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 32.2 feet on 11/02/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 33.4 Fri 8 pm CDT 29.1 17.2 13.0 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 9 AM CDT.
